EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Seattle Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow! Please see event details below and feel free to contact us at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Wednesday, August 9, 2017 {{my.Seattle:default=edit me}}
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Galvanize <[[https://www.galvanize.com/seattle/campus]]> Room: The Underground 111 S Jackson St, Seattle, WA 98104 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/601+N+34th+St,+Seattle,+WA+98103/@47.649386,-122.3525816,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54901506e022d7f1:0x6d8041a4139c9293!8m2!3d47.649386!4d-122.3503929?hl=en]]>)
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/seattle?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
For more in-depth reading on cloud-native, please visit our dedicated topic page on cloud-native applications <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
